enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding text to an element, with prependText adding text at the beginning and appendText adding text at the end.
append(String) adds HTML content to the end of an element, which can be used to set up the element's initial state before using prependText.
The text() method retrieves the combined text of an element, which can be used to verify the text added by prependText.
ownText() retrieves the text owned by the element itself, which can be used to verify the text added by prependText without including child elements.
